title: Remove subscription and make app completely free for all users

requirements.text: Remove any subscription, payment, or premium tier UI elements from all frontend components

quotes: اشتراک را بردار و کلا رایگان کن برای همه

acceptanceCriteria: No subscription prompts, payment buttons, or premium feature locks are visible in the UI
All messaging features remain accessible without any payment gates

requirements.text: Remove any subscription or payment-related backend logic, data models, and API endpoints

quotes: اشتراک را بردار و کلا رایگان کن برای همه

acceptanceCriteria: No subscription state or payment tracking exists in the backend data models
All users have equal access to all messaging functionality without subscription checks

requirements.text: Ensure all messaging features (send, edit, delete) are available to all users without any restrictions

quotes: اشتراک را بردار و کلا رایگان کن برای همه

acceptanceCriteria: Every user can send unlimited messages
Every user can edit and delete their own messages without restrictions
No usage limits or feature gates are enforced

constraints: Preserve existing username entry and messaging functionality
Do not modify the single-actor backend architecture
Do not change frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or other immutable paths
nonGoals: Implementing new messaging features beyond removal of restrictions
Changing the visual design or branding
